trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得可唯一識別字串<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>.

Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述的功能的字串<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This string typically returns the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串通常會傳回相同的文字所提供的工具提示控制項中。

trans-unit.source: The string describing the functionality of the element.

Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref>如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref> ，目標<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果項目，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>方法可以擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>相關聯</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>的</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
